attributes.title: This is all for Tiktok
attributes.review: See, here’s the thing, I’ve been hearing this huge rumor talking about Tiktok getting banned in America, so the only possibility that came to my head was was go to Tiktok only to realize that a TikToker was explaining the problem, so I understood and did what he told me to do because, let’s be honest, every teen out there really likes to use the app, I mean, if I’m being honest it’s a really great app. So if there was anything I would want to do to help the community out with this problem it’d be this. :/ (also just saying that Trump isn’t the best president to depend on -~-)

attributes.title: please delete the app❤️.
attributes.review: i heard everyone talking about this app so i downloaded it just to find this weird looking cheeto dude pop up on my screen. then he asked for my phone number so he could send me messages. nudes😳😳??  also the loading screen was white and it hurt my eyes to the point where i had to make an appointment to see my eye doctor. thanks to him i waisted $500 on an appointment for then to tell me my eyes are strained😔. pray for me please. also, the app doesn’t let me move on until i put in my phone number. i don’t understand why my phone number is required to use such an ugly app. america is not great. i hate it here. this app is spreading false lies and it is very unacceptable. i will not tolerate these actions and assaults over me. i am sick and tired of this. please take this app off the app store. no one should download it. it is a waste of money and storage.

attributes.title: Stealing Personal Info for China 😳
attributes.review: I downloaded this app for information for upcoming rallies that the current president would be having. The app however tried to steal my personal contact information which could be shared with China for all I know. I’m very disappointed in the software and display as well because my eyes can’t see that well. This app is a total bust for me. I told my neighbors including my Sunday bible study and pta association not to download this app and switch their votes. I can’t trust a president who tries to steal information from its own once loyal citizens. - Karen

attributes.title: if i could give this negative stars i would
attributes.review: first of all, i opened the app and it was just a link to a craigslist website selling used diapers? anyways, once i got passed that portion of the app it gave me an instruction manual on how to be a follower of a fascist dictator🤧😎lol so quirky! anyway, got confused and ended up getting my peepee stuck in my toaster... 😫😫😖 also if ur above the age of 50 i DEFINITELY don’t recommend bc apparently if you look at the cheeto for 30 seconds and spin around it gives you stage three brain cancer🤯🤯🤯😔 the only thing this app is serving is 🥳😤😭 jail time ✨🧚🏼‍♀️💕💕

attributes.title: very bad, complete and total waste of time
attributes.review: this app is boring, so boring it’s pathetic, and I mean, frankly, could it get any worse? Everybody is talking about this huuge mistake.  it’s a major disappointment, extremely huge disappointment - one of the worst I’ve ever seen. the dummies who designed this app should be fired immediately for this huge, huuge problem. I mean, I have many, many friends who will tell you- they’ll tell you it’s embarrassing. Believe me, I want this app gone as much as you, and because I’m very, very, very rich I’ll do a better job than these morons.

attributes.title: Baconeggandcheese👁👄👁
attributes.review: In complete honesty, this app gotta go. After downloading it and fidgeting with a couple buttons my garage door started opening and closing, the lights were turning on and off, the faucet started leaking. I was very confused. The first thing I saw when I opened the app was a picture of what seems to be a large, fake tan wearing, räpįśt, pëdò, racist, hömøphôbìc man (amongst other things) I felt very offended. I proceeded to look through the other features. After pressing the settings button the app seems to have summoned satan himself into my house. All in all it’s a terrible app 😌💉‼️💫✨👑🙄🥊♨️🥳🔏💅🏾💪🏾❤️👁👄👁

attributes.title: this app called me a karen
attributes.review: i downloaded this app bc i think our orange president has been doing a GREAT job for our country 😍 he cut ties with the WHO in the middle of a pandemic 🧚🏼✨he said its their fault our country can't handle miss rona and he's right! it's their fault trumpy waited to declare an emergency! and he wants schools to reopen!! 🥰 education >>>> health. anyway i downloaded this app to show him my eternal love but then this app had the nerve to call me a karen that is so racist. 🇺🇸 i love my president and i'm not a snowflake but unfortunately i can't keep this app bc i have a big ego too. ps trump teach me how to have ur hair 🙈

attributes.title: Glitchy
attributes.review: I honestly had the highest expectations for this app!! More than any other app I’ve ever downloaded!! And it was just horrible! Not only did it glitch out, crash my phone, delete all my pictures, use all my data, change my passwords, eat all my food and push my grandmother down the steps; it was also telling me false information!! Saying how the Orange man in office will make a good president! For a news app this is simply outrageous and I can’t believe you’d keep such an app in the store. Please delete this Apple!!! I expected much better!! :((

attributes.title: WORST APP
attributes.review: WHEN I DOWNLOADED THIS APP IT WAS A CHAOTIC MESS!!!!! my phone started glitching and then it turned into a pirate ship which lead to it breaking my home so then I became homeless and the orange man who runs our country won’t do anything about it because he doesn’t care about anyone but himself so now I have to find a new home to live in which would make me in debt because I am broke. That means the IRS will come for me and my family and will try to kill me because I owe them money which I do not have because no one is hiring me so I can’t make money. If I die just know it was 🍊fault!!!! (And the irs)
